original: Idaṃ me patirupanti cintetvā aṭṭhadhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajja.

original: Vuttañhetaṃ buddhavaṃse.

original: Dīpaṅkaro lokavidū - āhutīnaṃ paṭiggaho,

original: bhikkhunaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi, nigrodhatthera gateneva pasādena, nigrodhattheropi

original: rājānaṃ saparisaṃ tīsu saraṇesu pañcasu ca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā buddhasāsane pothujjanikena

original: pasādena acalappasādaṃ katvā patiṭṭhāpesi.
analyzed: pasādena acala pasādam katvā patiṭṭhāpesi

original: Puna rāja asokārāmaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kārapetvā saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhattaṃ

original: dhammo nāma kittako hotīti. Mahārāja nava aṅgāni, khaṇdato caturāsīti dhammakkhaṇdha sahassānīti.
analyzed: dhammaḥ nāma kittakaḥ hoti iti mahā rāja nava aṅgāni khaṇdataḥ caturāsīti dhammakkhaṇdha sahassāni iti

original: Rājā dhamme pasīditvā ekekaṃ dhammakkhaṇdhaṃ ekekena vihārena pūjessāmīti ekadivasameva
analyzed: rājā dhamme pasīditvā ekekam dhammakkhaṇdham ekekena vihārena pūjessāmi iti eka divasam eva

original: sayañca asokārāme asoka mahāvihāratthāya kammaṃ paṭṭhapesi.

original: Saṅgho iṇdaguttattheraṃ nāma mahiddhiyaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ navakammādhiṭṭhāyakaṃ

analyzed: devatāḥ antarāyam karentu uti āha

original: Caturāsīti sahassa thūpakathā

original: Tadā nāgarā therānaṃ guṇe sutvā there daṭṭhuṃ na labhāmāti upakkosanti atha rājā
analyzed: tadā nāgarāḥ guṇe sutvā there daṭṭhum na labhāma ati upakkosanti atha rājā

original: idha okāso natthīti cintetvā,’gacchatha bhaṇe hatthisālaṃ paṭijaggitvā vālukaṃ okiritvā
analyzed: idha okāsaḥ na atthi iti cintetvā āgacchatha bhaṇe hatthi sālam paṭijaggitvā vālukam okiritvā

original: pañcavaṇṇāni pupphāni vikiritvā vitānaṃ baṇdhitvā maṅgala hatthiṭṭhāne therānaṃ āsanāni
analyzed: pañcavaṇṇāni pupphāni vikiritvā vitānam baṇdhitvā maṅgala hatthiṭṭhāne therānaṃ āsanāni

original: paññāpethā’ti āha, amaccā tathā akaṃsu.
analyzed: paññāpetha iti āha amaccā tathā akaṃsu

original: Thero tattha gantvā nisīditvā devadūtasuttantaṃ kathesi kathā pariyosāne pāṇasahassaṃ
analyzed: thero tattha gantvā nisīditvā deva dūta suttantam kathesi kathā pariyosāne pāṇa sahassam

original: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi tathā hatthisālā sambādhāti dakkhiṇadvāre naṇdanuyyāne
analyzed: sotāpatti phale tathā hatthi sālā sambādhāti dakkhiṇa dvāre naṇdan uyyāne

original: āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Thero tattha nisīditvā āsivisopama suttantaṃ kathesi. Tampi sutvā
analyzed: āsanam paññāpesuṃ thero tattha nisīditvā āsivisopama suttantam kathesi tam pi sutvā

original: pāṇasahassaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ paṭilabhi evaṃ āgatadivasato dutiyadivase aḍḍhateyyānaṃ
analyzed: pāṇa sahassam sotāpatti phalam evam āgata divasataḥ dutiya divase aḍḍhateyyānam

original: pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
analyzed: pāṇa sahassānam dhamma abhisamayaḥ ahosi

original: Therassa naṇdanavane āgatāgatāhi kulitthīhi kulasuṇhāhi kulakumārīhi saddhi samodamānasseva
analyzed: therassa naṇdana vane āgata āgatāhi kulitthīhi kula suṇhāhi kula kumārīhi saddhi samodamānassa iva

original: sāyaṇhasamayo jāto, thero kālaṃ sallakkhetvā gacchāmi’dāni missaka pabbatanti uṭṭhahi.
analyzed: sāyaṇha samayaḥ jātaḥ theraḥ kālam sallakkhetvā gacchāmi idāni missaka pabbatanti uṭṭhahi

original: Amaccā mahāmeghavanuyyāne there vāsesuṃ rājāpi kho tassā rattiyā accayena therassa
analyzed: amaccāḥ mahāmeghavanuyyāne there vāsesum rājā api kho tassā rattiyā accayena therassa

original: samīpaṃ gantvā sukhasayitabhāvaṃ pucchitvā kappati bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmoti
analyzed: samīpam gantvā sukhasayita bhāvam pucchitvā kappati bhante bhikkhu saṅghassa ārāmaḥ ti

original: pucchi. Thero kappati mahārājāti āha.
analyzed: pucchi thero kappati mahā rājā iti āha

original: Rājā tuṭṭho suvaṇṇa bhiṃkāraṃ gahetvā therassa hatthe udakaṃ pātetvā mahāmeghavanuyyānaṃ
analyzed: rājā tuṭṭhaḥ suvaṇṇa bhiṃkāram gahetvā therassa hatthe udakam pātetvā mahā meghavan uyyānam

original: adāsi thero punadivasepi rājageheyeva bhuñjitvā naṇdanavane anamataggiyāni kathesi.
analyzed: adāsi thero puna divase pi bhuñjitvā naṇdana vane anamataggiyāni kathesi

original: Puna divase aggikkhaṇdhopama suttantaṃ kathesi. Eteneva upāyena satta divasāni kathesi
analyzed: puna divase aggikkhaṇdhopama suttantam kathesi etena iva upāyena satta divasāni kathesi

original: aḍḍha nacamānaṃ pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Sattame divase pana thero antopure
analyzed: aḍḍha pāṇa sahassānam dhamma abhisamayaḥ ahosi sattame divase pana thero antopure

original: rañño appamāda suttantaṃ kathayitvā cetiyagirimeva agamāsi.
analyzed: raññaḥ appamāda suttantam kathayitvā cetiyagirim eva agamāsi

original: Atha kho rājā thero āyācito sayamevāgato, tasmā tassa anāpucchā gamanampi bhaveyyāti
analyzed: atha kho rājā theraḥ āyācitaḥ sayam eva āgataḥ tasmā tassa an āpucchā gamanam pi bhaveyya ati

original: cintetvā rathaṃ abhirūhitvā, cetiyagiriṃ agamāsi mahatā rājānubhāvena gantvā therānaṃ
analyzed: cintetvā ratham abhirūhitvā cetiya girim agamāsi mahatā rāja anubhāvena gantvā therānam

original: santikaṃ upasaṅkamanto ativiya kilantarūpo hutvā upasaṅkami. Tato naṃ thero āha kasmā
analyzed: santikam upasaṅkamantaḥ ativiya kilanta rūpaḥ hutvā upasaṅkami tatas nam theraḥ āha kasmai

original: tvaṃ mahārāja evaṃ kilama māno āgatoti. Tumhe mama gāḷhaṃ ovādaṃ datvā idāni gantukāmā
analyzed: tvam mahā rājaḥ evam tumhe mama gāḍham ovādam idāni gantu kāmā

original: nukhoti jānanatthaṃ bhanteti. Na mayaṃ mahārāja gantukāmā, api ca vassupanāyika kālonamāyaṃ
analyzed: nu kho ti jānana attham bhante iti na mayam mahā rāja gantu kāmāḥ api ca vassupanāyika kāla ūnam āyam

original: samaṇena nāma vassupanāyikaṃ ṭhānaṃ ñātuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Rājāpi kho taṃkhaṇaṃyeva karaṇḍaka
analyzed: samaṇena nāma vassupanāyikam ṭhānam ñātum vaṭṭati iti rājā api kho karaṇḍaka

original: cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ parikkhipitvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā leṇesu kammaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nagarameva agamāsi.
analyzed: cetiya ṅgaṇam parikkhipitvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā leṇesu kammam paṭṭhapetvā nagaram eva agamāsi

original: Tepi thero mahājanaṃ ovadamānā cetiyagirimhi vassaṃ vasiṃsu. Athāyasmā mahāmahiṇdo
analyzed: te pi theraḥ mahājanam ovadamānā cetiyagirimhi vassam vasiṃsu atha āyasmai mahāmahiṇdaḥ

original: vutthavasso pavāretvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ uposathadivase rājānaṃ etadavoca ciradiṭṭho
analyzed: vuttha vassaḥ pavāretvā kattika puṇṇamāyam uposatha divase rājānam etat avoca cira diṭṭhaḥ

original: no mahārāja sammāsambuddho abhivādana paccupaṭṭhāna añjali kamma sāmīci kamma karaṇaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: no mahā rāja sammāsambuddhaḥ abhivādana paccupaṭṭhāna añjali kamma sāmīci kamma karaṇa ṭṭhānaṃ

original: natthi, tenamhaṃ ukkaṇṭhitāti tanu bhante tumhe avocuttha parinibbuto sammāsambuddhoti
analyzed: natthi tena mham ukkaṇṭhitā ati tanu bhante tumhe avocuttha parinibbutaḥ sammāsambuddho ti

original: kiñcāpi mahārāja parinibbuto, athassa sarīradhātuyo tiṭṭhantīti. Aññā tambhante thūpaṃ
analyzed: kiñca api mahā rāja parinibbutaḥ athassa sarīra dhātuyaḥ tiṭṭhanti iti aññā tambhante thūpam

original: patiṭṭhāpemi bhūmibhāgaṃ vicinathāti. Api ca dhātuyo kuto lacchāmīti sumanena saddhiṃ
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpemi bhūmi bhāgam vicinatha ati api ca kutas lacchāmi iti sumanena saddhim

original: mantehi mahārājāti rājā sumanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi’kutodāni bhantedhātuyo lacchāmā’ti
analyzed: mantehi mahā rāja ati rājā sumanam upasaṅkamitvā pucchi kutodāni lacchāma ati

original: sumano āha-appossukko tvaṃ mahārāja, vīthiyo sodhāpetvā dhaja patāka puṇṇaghaṭādīhi
analyzed: sumanaḥ āha appa ussukkaḥ tvam mahā rāja vīthiyaḥ sodhāpetvā dhaja patāka puṇṇa ghaṭa ādīhi

original: alaṅkārāpetvā saparijjano uposathaṃ samādiyitvā sabbatālāvacare upaṭṭhapetvā maṅgalahatthiṃ
analyzed: alaṅkārāpetvā sa parijjanaḥ uposatham samādiyitvā sabba tālāvacare upaṭṭhapetvā maṅgalahatthim

original: sabbālaṅkārehi patimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā upari vassa setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā sāyaṇhasamaye
analyzed: sabba alaṅkārehi patimaṇḍitam kāretvā upari vassa seta chattam ussāpetvā sāyaṇha samaye

original: mahānāgavanuyyānābhimukho yā hi addhā tasmiṃ ṭhāne dhātuyo lacchasiti, rājā sādhūti
analyzed: mahā nāgavan uyyāna abhimukhaḥ hi addhā tasmin ṭhāne rājā sādhu iti

original: sampaṭicchi. Thero cetiyagirimeva agamiṃsu.
analyzed: sampaṭicchi thero cetiyagirim eva agamiṃsu

original: Tatrāyasmā mahiṇdatthero sumana sāmaṇeramāha- gaccha tvaṃ sāmaṇera jambudīpe ayyakaṃ
analyzed: tatra ayasmān mahiṇdattheraḥ sumana sāmaṇeram āha gaccha tvam sāmaṇera jambudīpe ayyakam

original: asokadhammarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena evaṃ vadehi’sahāyo te mahārāja devānampiya
analyzed: asokadhamma rājānam upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena evam te mahā rāja devānampiya

original: tisso buddhasāsane pasanno thūpaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmo tumhākaṃ kira hatthe bhagavato
analyzed: tissaḥ buddha sāsane pasannaḥ thūpam patiṭṭhāpetu kāmo tumhākam kira hatthe bhagavataḥ

original: paribhuttapatto cevadhātu ca atthi, tamme dethā’ti taṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ
analyzed: paribhutta patto ca atthi tam me detha ati tam gahetvā sakkam devarājānam

original: upasaṅkamitvā tumhākaṃ kira mahārāja hatthe dve dhātuyo atthi dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca,
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā tumhākam kira mahā rāja hatthe dve dhātuyaḥ atthi dakkhiṇa dāṭhā ca dakkhiṇa khakañca

original: tatotumhe dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃpūjetha, dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ pana mayhaṃ dethāti, evañca naṃ
analyzed: tato tumhe dakkhiṇa kkhakam pana mayham detha ati evam ca naṃ

original: vadehi kasmā tvaṃ mahārāja amhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pahiṇitvā pamajjitthāti.
analyzed: vadehi kasmai tvam mahā rāja amhe tamba paṇṇi dīpam pahiṇitvā pamajjittha iti

original: Sādhu bhanteti kho sumano therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tāvadeva pattacīvaramādāya
analyzed: sādhu bhante iti kho sumano therassa vacanam sampaṭicchitvā tāvat eva patta cīvaram ādāya

original: vehāsamabbhuggantvā pāṭaliputtadvāre oruyha rañño santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi
analyzed: vehāsam abbhut gantvā pāṭaliputta dvāre oruyha rañño santikam gantvā tam attham ārocesi

original: rājā tuṭṭho sāmaṇerassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā bhojetvā bhagavato pattaṃ gaṇdhehi
analyzed: rājā tuṭṭhaḥ sāmaṇerassa hatthato pattam gahetvā bhojetvā bhagavato pattam gaṇdhehi

original: ubbaṭṭetvā varamuttasadisānaṃ dhātūnaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
analyzed: ubbaṭṭetvā dhātūnam pūretvā adāsi

original: So tuṃ gahetvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkami sakko devārājā sāmaṇeraṃ disvā kiṃ bhante
analyzed: saḥ tum gahetvā sakkam devarājānam upasaṅkami sakkaḥ devarājā sāmaṇeram disvā kim bhante

original: sumana āhiṇḍasīti āha. Tvaṃ mahārāja amhe tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ pahiṇitvā kasmā pamajjasīti,
analyzed: sumanaḥ āhiṇḍasi iti āha tvam mahā rāja amhe tamba paṇṇi dīpam pahiṇitvā kasmai pamajjasi iti

original: tappamajjāmi bhante, vadehi kiṃ karomīti. Tumhākaṃ kira hatthe dve dhātuyo atthi
analyzed: tat pamajjāmi bhante vadehi kim karomi iti tumhākam kira hatthe dve dhātuyaḥ atthi

original: dakkhiṇadāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca, tato tumhe dakkhiṇadāṭhaṃ pūjetha dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ
analyzed: dakkhiṇa dāṭhā ca dakkhiṇakkhakañca tatas tumhe dakkhiṇa dāṭham pūjetha dakkhiṇakkhakam

original: pana mayhaṃ dethāti. Sādhu bhanteti kho sakko devānamiṇdo yojanappamānaṃ maṇithūpaṃ
analyzed: pana mayham detha ati sādhu bhante iti kho sakkaḥ devānamiṇdaḥ yojana ppamānam maṇi thūpam

original: ugghāṭetvā dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ nīharitvā sumanassa adāsi.
analyzed: ugghāṭetvā dakkhiṇa kkhakam nīharitvā sumanassa adāsi

original: So taṃ gahetvā cetiyagirimhiyeva patiṭṭhāsi atha kho mahiṇdapamukhā sabbe te mahānāgā
analyzed: saḥ tam gahetvā cetiya girimhiyā iva patiṭṭhāsi atha kho mahiṇda pamukhā sabbe te mahā nāgā

original: asokadhammarājena dinna dhātuyo cetiyagiriyamhiyeva patiṭṭhāpetvā dakkhiṇakkhakaṃ
analyzed: asokadhammarājena dinna patiṭṭhāpetvā dakkhiṇakkhakam

original: ādāya vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya mahānāga vanuyyānamagamaṃsu. Rājāpi kho sumanena vuttappakāraṃ
analyzed: ādāya vaḍḍhamānaka chāyāya mahā nāga vana uyyānam agamaṃsu rājā api kho sumanena vutta ppakāram

original: pūjāsakkāraṃ katvā hatthikkhaṇdhavaragato sāyaṃ maṅgalahatthimatthake setacchattaṃ
analyzed: pūjā sakkāram katvā hatthi kkhaṇdha vara gataḥ sāyam maṅgala hatthi matthake seta chattam

original: dhārayamāno mahānāga vanuyyānaṃ sampāpuṇi.
analyzed: dhārayamānaḥ mahā nāga vanuyyānam sampāpuṇi

original: Athassa etadahosi- sace ayaṃ sammāsambuddhassa dhātu, chattaṃ apanamatu, maṅgalahatthi
analyzed: atha assa etat ahosi sace ayam sammāsambuddhassa dhātu chattam apanamatu maṅgala hatthi

original: jaṇṇukehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāhatu, dhātu caṅgoṭakaṃ mayhaṃ matthake patiṭṭhahatūti
analyzed: jaṇṇukehi bhūmiyam patiṭṭhāhatu dhātu caṅgoṭakam mayham matthake patiṭṭhahatu uti

original: saha rañño cittuppādena chattaṃ apanami hatthijaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhahi dhātucaṅgoṭakaṃ
analyzed: saha raññaḥ citta uppādena chattam apanami hatthi jaṇṇukehi patiṭṭhahi dhātu caṅgoṭakam

original: rañño matthake patiṭṭhahi rājā amatenevābhisittagatto paramena pītipāmojjena samannāgato
analyzed: raññaḥ matthake patiṭṭhahi rājā amatena iva abhisitta gattaḥ paramena pīti pāmojjena samannāgataḥ

original: hutvā pucchi dhātuṃ bhante kiṃ karomīti. Hatthikumbhiyeva tāva mahārāja ṭhapehīti.
analyzed: hutvā pucchi dhātum bhante kim karomi iti hatthi kumbhiyā iva tāva mahā rāja ṭhapehi iti

original: Rājā dhātuvaṅgoṭakaṃ hatthikumbhe ṭhapesi. Pamudito nāgo kuñcanādaṃ nadi mahāmegho
analyzed: rājā dhātu vaṅgoṭakam hatthi kumbhe ṭhapesi pamuditaḥ nāgaḥ kuñcanādam nadi mahā megho

original: uṭṭhahitvā pokkharavassaṃ vasisi ukadapariyantaṃ katvā mahābhūmicālo ahosi paccantepi
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvā pokkhara vassam vasisi ukada pariyantam katvā mahā bhūmicālo ahosi paccante pi

original: nāma sammāsambuddhassa dhātuyo patiṭṭhahissantīti.
analyzed: nāma sammāsambuddhassa dhātuyaḥ patiṭṭhahissanti iti

original: Atha so hatthināgo aneka tālāvacaraparivuto ativiya uḷārena pūjāsakkārena sakkariyamāno
analyzed: atha saḥ hatthi nāgaḥ tālāvacara parivutaḥ uḷārena pūjā sakkārena sakkariyamāno

original: pacchimadisābhimukho hutvā apasakkanto yāva nagarassa puratthima dvāraṃ tāva gantvā
analyzed: pacchima disā abhimukhaḥ hutvā apasakkantaḥ yāva nagarassa puratthima dvāram tāva gantvā

original: puratthimena dvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā sakalanagare uḷārāya pūjāya kayirāmānāya dakkhiṇadvārena
analyzed: puratthimena dvārena nagaram pavisitvā sakala nagare uḷārāya pūjāya kayirāmānāya dakkhiṇa dvārena

original: nikkhamitvā thūpārāmassa pacchimadisābhāge pabhejavatthu nāma kira atthi tattha gantvā
analyzed: nikkhamitvā thūpa ārāmassa pacchima disā bhāge pabhejavatthu nāma kira atthi tattha gantvā

original: puna thūpārāmābhimukho eva paṭinivatti. So ca purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ
analyzed: puna thūpa ārāma abhimukhaḥ eva paṭinivatti saḥ ca purimakānam tiṇṇam sammāsambuddhānam

original: dhammakarakaṃ kāyabaṇdhanaṃ udakasāṭīkaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā katacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ hotī. Tadetaṃ
analyzed: dhamma karakam kāya baṇdhanam udaka sāṭīkam patiṭṭhāpetvā kata cetiya ṭṭhānam hoti tat etam

original: vinaṭṭhesupi cetiyesu devatānubhāvena kaṇṭaka samākiṇṇasākhāhi nānāgacchehi parivutaṃ
analyzed: vinaṭṭhesu pi cetiyesu devatā anubhāvena kaṇṭaka samākiṇṇa sākhāhi nānā gacchehi parivutam

original: tiṭṭhati. Mā naṃ koci ucciṭṭhā suvimala kacavarehi saṇdusesīti.
analyzed: tiṭṭhati mā nam koci ucciṭṭhā su vimala kaca varehi saṇdusesi iti

original: Atha tassa hatthino purato gantvā rājapurisā sabba gacche chiṇditvā bhūmiṃ sodhetvā
analyzed: atha tassa hatthino puratas gantvā rāja purisā gacche chiṇditvā bhūmim sodhetvā

original: taṃ hatthatalasadisaṃ akaṃsu. Hatthināgo gantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ purato katvā tassa pacchimadisābhāge
analyzed: tam hattha tala sadisam akaṃsu hatthi nāgaḥ gantvā tam ṭhānam puratas katvā tassa pacchima disā bhāge

original: bodhirukkhaṭṭhane aṭṭhāsi. Athassa matthakato dhātuṃ oropetuṃ ārabhiṃsu nāgo oropetuṃ
analyzed: bodhi rukkha ṭṭhane aṭṭhāsi athassa matthakataḥ dhātum oropetum ārabhiṃsu nāgaḥ oropetum

original: na deti. Theraṃ pucchi, kasmā bhante nāgo dhātuṃ oropetuṃ na detīti
analyzed: na deti theram pucchi kasmai bhante nāgaḥ dhātum na deti iti

original: Āruḷhaṃ mahārāja oropetuṃ na vaṭṭatiti. Tasmiñca kāle abhayavāpiyā udakaṃ jinnaṃ
analyzed: āruḍham mahā rājaḥ oropetum na vaṭṭati tasmin ca kāle abhaya vāpiyā udakam jinnam

original: hoti samantā bhūmi phalitā suuddharā mattikapiṇḍā. Tato mahājano sīghasīghaṃ mattikaṃ
analyzed: hoti samantā bhūmi phalitā suuddharā mattika piṇḍā tatas mahā janaḥ sīgha sīgham mattikam

original: āharitvā hatthakumbhappamāṇaṃ vatthumakāsi. Tāvadeva thūpakaraṇatthaṃ iṭṭhikā kātuṃ
analyzed: āharitvā hattha kumbha ppamāṇam vatthum akāsi tāvat eva thūpa karaṇa attham iṭṭhikā kātum

original: ārabhiṃsu. Yāva iṭṭhikā pariniṭṭhanti tāva hatthināgo katipāhaṃ divā bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne
analyzed: ārabhiṃsu yāva iṭṭhikā pariniṭṭhanti tāva hatthi nāgaḥ katipāham divā bodhi rukkha ṭṭhāne

original: hatthisālāyaṃ tiṭṭhati. Rattiyaṃ thūpapatiṭṭhāna bhūmiyaṃ pariyāyati.
analyzed: hatthi sālāyam tiṭṭhati rattiyam thūpa patiṭṭhāna bhūmiyam pariyāyati

original: Atha vatthuṃ vināpetvā rājā theraṃ pucchi, kīdiso bhante thūpo kātabboti. Vīhirāsi
analyzed: atha vatthum vināpetvā rājā theram pucchi kīdisaḥ bhante thūpo kātabbaḥ ti

original: sadiso mahārājāti, sādhu bhanteti rājā jaṅghappamāṇaṃ thūpaṃ cināpetvā dhātuoropanatthāya
analyzed: sadisaḥ mahā rājā iti sādhu bhante iti rājā jaṅgha ppamāṇam thūpam cināpetvā dhātu oropana tthāya

original: mahāsakkāraṃ kāresi.
analyzed: mahā sakkāram kāresi

original: Tato sakalanāgarā ca jānapadā ca dhātumha dassanatthaṃ santipatiṃsu sannipatite ca
analyzed: tatas sakala nāgarā ca jānapadā ca dassana attham santipatiṃsu sannipatite ca

original: tasmiṃ mahājane dasabalassa dhātu hatthikumbhato sattatālappamānaṃ vehāsamabbhuggantvā
analyzed: tasmin mahājane dasabalassa dhātu hatthi kumbhato satta tāla ppamānam vehāsam abbhut gantvā

original: yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi. Tehi tehi dhātuppadesehi chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo udakadharā ca
analyzed: yamaka pāṭihāriyam dassesi tehi tehi dhātu padesehi chabbaṇṇa raṃsiyaḥ udakadharā ca

original: aggikkhaṇdhā ca pavattanti. Sāvatthiyaṃ gaṇḍambamūle bhagavatā dassita pāṭihāriya
analyzed: aggi khaṇdhā ca pavattanti sāvatthiyam gaṇḍamba mūle bhagavatā dassita pāṭihāriya

original: sadisaṃ eva pāṭihāriyaṃ ahosi. Tañca kho neva therānubhāvenana devatānubhāvena, api
analyzed: sadisam eva pāṭihāriyam ahosi tat ca kho na iva thera anubhāvenana devatā anubhāvena api

original: ca kho buddhānaṃyeva ānubhāvena bhagavā kira dharamānova adhiṭṭhāsi - tambapaṇṇidīpe

analyzed: anurādhapurassa dakkhiṇa disā bhāge purimakānam tiṇṇam buddhānam cetiya ṭṭhāne mama

original: dakkhiṇakkhakadhātu patiṭṭhāna divase yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ hotūti.
analyzed: dakkhiṇakkhakadhātu patiṭṭhāna divase yamaka pāṭihāriyam hotu uti

original: Evaṃ acintiyā buddhā-buddhadhammā acintiyā,
analyzed: evam acintiyāḥ buddha abuddha dhammāḥ acintiyāḥ

original: Acintiyesu pasannānaṃ-vipāko hoti acintiyoti;
analyzed: acintiyesu pasanna anaṃvipākaḥ hoti acintiyaḥ ti

original: Dhātusarīrato nikkhanta udakaphusitehi sakalehi tambapaṇṇidīpatale na koci aphuṭṭhokāso
analyzed: dhātu sarīrataḥ nikkhantaḥ udaka phusitehi sakalehi tamba paṇṇi dīpa tale na koci a phuṭṭha ukāsaḥ

original: Saha dhātupatiṭṭhānena mahābhūmicālo ahosi niṭṭhite pana thūpe rājā ca rājā bhātikā

analyzed: ca deviyo ca denāgayakkhānam paccekam

original: Evaṃ jino dhātusarīrakena
analyzed: evam jinaḥ dhātu sarīrakena

original: Gatopi santiṃ janatāhitañca,
analyzed: gataḥ upi santim janatā hitañca

analyzed: sukham ca dhammā bahudhā kareyya

original: Ṭhito hi nāthonukaraṃ kareyya;
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ hi na athonukaram kareyya

original: 13. Niṭṭhitāya pana dhātupūjāya patiṭṭhite dhātuvare mahiṇdatthero mahāmeghavanuyyānameva

original: saṅghamittattheriṃ ānetunti sakkhissāmi deva sace me pabbajjaṃ anujānissasīti.

original: Gaccha tāta theriṃ ānetvā pabbajjāhīti. So rañño ca therissa ca sāsanaṃ gahetvā therassa

analyzed: evam āha sahāyassa kira te devānampiya tissassa bhātu jāyā anulādevī nāma pabbajitu kāmā

original: taṃ kira āgantvā pabbājethāti.
analyzed: tam kira āgantvā pabbājetha ati

analyzed: maggam paṭijaggāpetvā satta yojanāya āmaya ti yojana vitthatāya mahatiyā senāya pāṭaliputtato

analyzed: kusuma samākiṇṇam aneka turiya saṃghraṭṭham mahā bodhim parikkhipi tatas rājā puppha gaṇdha mālā ādīhi

analyzed: samāpajjitvā nisīdi purimakā ca tayo sammāsambuddhā samāpattim appetvā nisīdiṃsu

analyzed: evam vuddhiyā

original: Mahāmeghavane ramme-mahābodhi patiṭṭhitoti;

original: Bodhi āgamanakathā
analyzed: bodhi āgamana kathā

original: saṅghamittattheriyā santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva saparivārā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: saṅgha mitta theriyā santike pabbajitvā nacirassa iva sa parivārā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi

original: Ariṭṭhopi kho rañño bhāgineyyo pañcahi purisa satehi saddhiṃ therassa santike pabbajitvā
analyzed: ariṭṭhaḥ api kho raññaḥ bhāgineyyaḥ pañcahi purisa satehi saddhim therassa santike pabbajitvā

original: saparivāro nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi. Athekadivasaṃ rājā bodhiṃ vaṇditvā therena

original: saddhiṃ thūpārāmaṃ gacchati. Tassa lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ sampattassa purisā pupphāni

original: āhariṃsu rājā therassa pupphāni adāsi. Thero pupphehi lohapāsādaṭṭhānaṃ pūjesi pupphesu

original: bhūmiyā patita mattesu mahābhūmicālo ahosi?
analyzed: bhūmiyā mattesu mahā bhūmicālaḥ ahosi

original: Rājā kasmā bhante bhūmi calitāni pucchi. Imasmiṃ mahārāja okāse anāgate saṅghassa
analyzed: rājā kasmai bhante bhūmi calitāni pucchi imasmin mahā rāja okāse anāgate saṅghassa

original: uposathāgāraṃ bhavissati. Tassetaṃ pubbanimittanti āha. Puna tassa mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: uposatha āgāram bhavissati tassa itam pubba nimittam ti āha puna tassa mahā cetiya ṭṭhānam

original: sampattassa campaka pupphāni abhihariṃsu. Tānipi rājā therassa adāsi. Thero mahācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: sampattassa campaka pupphāni abhihariṃsu tāni api rājā therassa adāsi theraḥ mahā cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ

original: pupphehi pūjetvā vaṇdi tāvadeva mahāpathavī saṃkampi. Rājā bhante kasmā pathavī kampitthāti

analyzed: pucchi mahā rāja imasmin ṭhāne anāgate buddhassa bhagavataḥ asadisaḥ mahā thūpaḥ bhavissati

original: Tassetaṃ pubbanimittanti āha. Ahameva karomi bhanteti. Alaṃ mahārāja tumhākaṃ aññaṃ
analyzed: tassa itam pubba nimittam ti āha aham eva karomi bhante ti alam mahā rāja tumhākam aññam

original: bahuṃ kammaṃ atthi. Tumhākaṃ pana nantā duṭṭhagāmaṇī abhayo nāma kāressatīti.
analyzed: bahum kammam atthi tumhākam pana nantā duṭṭha gāmaṇī abhayaḥ nāma kāressati iti

original: Atha rājā sace bhante mayhaṃ nantā karissati. Kataṃyeva mayāti dvādasahatthaṃ pāsāṇatthamhaṃ

analyzed: nidhāpetvāna sambuddha dhātuyaḥ patta mattakā

original: Kārāpesi mahārāja-thūpe yojana yojaneti;
analyzed: mahārājathūpe yojana yojana iti

original: Yojanathūpa kathā
analyzed: yojanathūpa kathā

original: Atha rājā aññāni ca bahūni puññakammāni katvā cattālīsa vassāni rajjaṃ kāresi. Tassa
analyzed: atha rājā aññāni ca bahūni puñña kammāni katvā cattālīsa vassāni rajjam kāresi tassa

original: Tadatthadīpanatthaṃ ayamanupubbakathā
analyzed: tad attha dīpana ttham ayam anupubba kathā

analyzed: devānampiyatissa rañño kira dutiyabhātikaḥ uparājā mahānāgaḥ nāma ahosi atha rañño

original: dvādasayojanubbedhā aṭṭhacattālīsa yojana parikkhepaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ sahassa patimaṇḍitaṃ
analyzed: dvādasa yojanubbedhā aṭṭhacattālīsa yojana parikkhepam kūṭāgāram sahassa patimaṇḍitam

original: navabhūmakaṃ sahassagabbhaṃ khīraṇa devadhītāya puññānubhāvanibbattaṃ ākāsaṭṭhaṃ

original: adaṃsu saṅgho rañño pāhesi.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ raññaḥ pāhesi

original: Taṃ disvā rājā tuṭṭhamānaso tadā taṃ lekhatulyaṃ lohapāsādaṃ kāresi. Kammantārambha
analyzed: tam disvā rājā tuṭṭha mānasaḥ tadā tam lekha tulyam loha pāsādam kāresi kammanta ārambha

analyzed: kāle pana catusu dvāresu aṭṭhasata sahassāni hiraññāni tadā catusu dvāresu

analyzed: sahassa sahassam vattha puṭāni ca iva guḷa tela sakkhara madhupurāḥ aneka sahassa cāṭiyaḥ

original: ca ṭhapāpesi. Pāsāde amūlakena kammaṃ na kātabbanti bheriṃ cārapetvā amūlakena katakammaṃ

analyzed: ahosi tathā nava bhūmāyaḥ cassa ahesuṃ ekekissā bhūmiyā satam satam kūṭāgārāni

analyzed: tāni sabbāni api ratana khacitāni ca iva suvaṇṇa kiṅkiṇikā panti parikkhittāni ca ahesuṃ

analyzed: kūṭāgārāni nānā ratana bhūsikā pavāḷa vedikā ca iva tāsam padumāni ca nānā ratana

original: ca. Vessavanassa nārivābhanayānaṃ sutvā tadākāraṃ majjhe ratana maṇḍapaṃ kāresi.

original: So anekehi ratanatthambhehi sīhavyagghādi rūpehi devatā rūpehi ca patimaṇḍito samantato

analyzed: aṭṭhamaṅgalāni antarantarā ca catuppāda pantiyo ca kāresi chattante

original: cassa ratanamaya ghaṇṭāpantiyo olambiṃsu.

analyzed: pahāya dhana sañcayam

analyzed: anugāmi dhanam dānam evam kubbanti paṇḍitā

original: udakañca pattadhovanasākhañca adāsi.
analyzed: udakañca pattadhaḥ vana sākhañca adāsi

original: Thūpasādhana lābhakathā
analyzed: thūpa sādhana lābha kathā

original: ahesuṃ. Mahagghāni anekavaṇṇāni aṭṭhuttara sahassāni vatthāni olambiṃsu.

original: Tato bodhirukkhassa samantato satta ratanamaya vedikā kāretvā mahāmalaka muttā attharāpesi

original: Tāsu suvaṇṇaghaṭe pavāḷamayāni pupphāni ahesuṃ. Pavāḷaghaṭe suvaṇṇamayāni pupphāni.

original: sattaratanamayāni pupphāni ahesuṃ.

original: dassanaṭṭhāne saṅghassa kammamālake jhāpethāti. Tato kaniṭṭhaṃ āmantetvā’tāta! Tissa!

original: Mahāthūpe aniṭṭhitaṃ kammaṃ sādhukaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Sāyaṃ pāto ca mahāthūpe pupphapūjaṃ
analyzed: mahā thūpe aniṭṭhitam kammam sādhukam niṭṭhāpesi sāyam pāto ca mahā thūpe puppha pūjam

original: kāretvā tikkhattuṃ upahāraṃ kārehi. Mayā ṭhapitaṃ dānavaṭṭaṃ sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā
analyzed: kāretvā tikkhattum upahāram kārehi mayā ṭhapitam dānavaṭṭam sabbam a parihāpetvā

original: saṅghassa kattabbakiccesu sadā appamatto hohī’ti anusāyitvā tuṇhi ahosi.
analyzed: saṅghassa kattabba kiccesu sadā appamattaḥ hohi iti tuṇhi ahosi

original: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhu gaṇasajjhāyaṃ ārabhiṃsu devatā pana chadeva lokato cha rathe
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe bhikkhu gaṇa sajjhāyam ārabhiṃsu devatā pana chadeva lokataḥ cha rathe

original: gahetvā ādāya paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā mahārāja amhākaṃ devaloko ramaṇīyo, amhākaṃ devaloko
analyzed: gahetvā ādāya paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā mahā rāja amhākam deva lokaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ amhākam deva lokaḥ

original: ramaṇīyoti vatvā attano attano devalokaṃ āgamanatthāya yāciṃsu rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ
analyzed: ramaṇīyaḥ iti vatvā attano attano deva lokaṃ āgamana tthāya yāciṃsu rājā tesam vacanaṃ

original: sutvā yāvāhaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāmi- tāva adhivāsethāti te hatthasaññāya nivāresi saṅgho
analyzed: sutvā yāva aham dhammam suṇāmi tāva adhivāsetha ati te hattha saññāya nivāresi saṅghaḥ

original: gaṇasajjhāyaṃ nivāresīti maññitvā sajjhāyaṃ ṭhapāpesi.
analyzed: gaṇa sajjhāyam nivāresi iti maññitvā sajjhāyam ṭhapāpesi

original: Rājā kasmā bhante gaṇasajjhāyaṃ ṭhapethāti āha. Mahārāja tayā hatthasaññāya nivāritattāti.
analyzed: rājā kasmai bhante gaṇa sajjhāyam ṭhapetha ati āha mahā rāja tayā hattha saññāya nivārita ttā ati

original: Bhante tumhākaṃ saññaṃ nādāsiṃ. Devatā chadevalokato cha rathe ānetvā attano attano
analyzed: bhante tumhākam saññam devatā cha deva lokataḥ cha rathe ānetvā attano attano

original: devalokaṃ gantuṃ yācanti tasmā tesaṃ yāvāhaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāmi tāva āgamethāti saññaṃ
analyzed: deva lokam gantum yācanti tasmā tesam yāva aham dhammam suṇāmi tāva āgametha ati saññam

original: adāsinti taṃ sutvā keci ayaṃ rājā maraṇabhayabhito vippalapati, maraṇato abhāyanaka
analyzed: tam sutvā keci ayam rājā maraṇa bhaya bhitas vippalapati maraṇataḥ

original: satto nāma natthīti maññiṃsu.
analyzed: sattaḥ nāma na atthi iti maññiṃsu

original: Tato abhayatthero āha kathaṃ mahārāja saddahituṃ sakkā cha devalokato cha rathā ānītāti
analyzed: tatas abhaya theraḥ āha katham mahā rāja saddahitum sakkā cha deva lokataḥ cha rathāḥ ānītāḥ ati

original: taṃ sutvā rājā ākāse pupphadāmāni khipāpesi. Tāni gantvā visuṃ rathadhure olambiṃsu
analyzed: tam sutvā rājā ākāse puppha dāmāni khipāpesi tāni gantvā visum ratha dhure olambiṃsu

original: mahājano ākāse olambantāni pupphadāmāni disvā nikkaṅkho ahosi.
analyzed: mahā janaḥ ākāse olambantāni puppha dāmāni disvā nikkaṅkhaḥ ahosi

original: Tato rājā theraṃ pucchi-katamo pana bhante devaloko ramaṇīyoti. Tusitabhavanaṃ pana
analyzed: tatas rājā theram pucchikatamaḥ pana bhante deva lokaḥ tusita bhavanam pana

original: mahārāja ramaṇīyaṃ, buddhabhāvāya samayaṃ olokento metteyyo bodhisattopi tasmiṃyeva vasatīti āha.
analyzed: mahā rāja ramaṇīyam buddha bhāvāya samayam olokentaḥ metteyyaḥ bodhisattaḥ api tasmin yeva vasati iti āha

original: Taṃ sutvā rājā tasmiṃ ālayaṃ katvā mahāthūpaṃ olokento nipannova cavitvā suttappabuddho
analyzed: tam sutvā rājā tasmin ālayam katvā mahā thūpam olokentaḥ nipannaḥ iva cavitvā sutta ppabuddhaḥ

original: viya tusita bhavanato āhaṭa. Rathe nibbattitvā attano katapuññassa thalaṃ mahājanassa
analyzed: viya tusita bhavanataḥ āhaṭa rathe nibbattitvā attano kata puññassa thalam mahājanassa

original: pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ratheyeva ṭhatvā dibbābharaṇa vibhūsito mahājanassa passantasseva tikkhattuṃ
analyzed: pākaṭam kātum ṭhatvā dibba ābharaṇa vibhūsitaḥ mahā janassa passantassa iva tikkhattum

original: mahāthūpaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghañca vaṇditvā tusitabhavanaṃ agamāsi.
analyzed: mahā thūpam padakkhiṇam katvā bhikkhu saṅghañca vaṇditvā tusita bhavanam agamāsi

original: Evaṃ asāre nicaye dhanānaṃ aniccasaṅghaṃ sattaṃ sapaññā,
analyzed: evam asāre nicaye dhanānam anicca saṅgham sattam sa paññā

original: Katvana cāgaṃ ratanattayamahi ādāya sāraṃ sugatiṃ vajanti;
analyzed: ādāya sāram su gatim vajanti

original: Rañño nāṭakatthiyo matabhāvaṃ ñatvā yattha ṭhitā makuḷaṃ mocayiṃsu tatthaṃ ṭhāne
analyzed: raññaḥ nāṭakatthiyaḥ mata bhāvam ñatvā yattha ṭhitāḥ makuḷam mocayiṃsu tattham ṭhāne

original: katasālā makuḷamuttasālānāmajātā. Rañño sarīrasmiṃ citakaṃ āropite yattha mahājano
analyzed: katasālāḥ makuḷa muttasālā nāma jātāḥ rañño sarīrasmiṃ citakam āropite yattha mahājano

original: hatthe paggahetvā viraci. Tattha katasālā viracitthasālā nāma jātā. Rañño sarīraṃ
analyzed: hatthe paggahetvā viraci tattha kata sālā viracitthasālā nāma jātā rañño sarīram

original: yattha jhāpesuṃ - so sīmāmālako rājamālako nāma jāto. Atha rañño kaniṭṭhabhātā saddhātissamahārājā
analyzed: yattha jhāpesum saḥ sīmāmālakaḥ rājamālakaḥ nāma jātaḥ atha raññaḥ kaniṭṭha bhātā saddhātissa mahā rājā

original: nāma hutvā cetiye aniṭṭhataṃ jattakammaṃ sudhākammañca niṭṭhāpetvā thūpamakāsīti
analyzed: nāma hutvā cetiye jatta kammam sudhā kammam ca niṭṭhāpetvā thūpam akāsi iti

original: Iti sādhujana manopasādanatthāya kate thūpavaṃse mahācetiye katā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: iti sādhu jana mana upasādana tthāya kate thūpavaṃse mahā cetiye katā niṭṭhitā

original: 26. Etarahi duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahārājassa pitā kākavaṇṇatissa rājā metteyyassa
analyzed: etarahi duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhaya mahā rājassa pitā kākavaṇṇatissa rājā metteyyassa

original: bhagavato pitā bhavissati. Vihāramahādevī mātā bhavissati. Duṭṭhagāmiṇi abhayo aggasāvako
analyzed: bhagavato pitā bhavissati vihāramahādevī mātā bhavissati duṭṭhagāmiṇi abhayaḥ aggasāvako

original: bhavissati. Kaniṭṭho dutiya sāvako bhavisasati. Rañño pitucchā anuḷādevī aggamahesī
analyzed: bhavissati kaniṭṭhaḥ dutiya sāvakaḥ bhavisasati raññaḥ pitucchā anuḷādevī aggamahesī

original: bhavissati. Rañño putto sāli rājakumāro putto bhavissati. Bhaṇḍāgārika saṅghāmacco
analyzed: bhavissati rañño putto sāli rāja kumāro putto bhavissati saṅgha amaccaḥ

original: aggupaṭṭhāko bhavissati tassāmaccassa dhītā aggupaṭṭhāyikā bhavissatīti evaṃ sabbepi
analyzed: aggupaṭṭhākaḥ bhavissati tassa amaccassa dhītā aggupaṭṭhāyikā bhavissati iti evam sabbe pi

original: katādhikārā hetu sampannā tassa bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā dukkhassantaṃ karitvā anupādisesāya
analyzed: kata adhikārā hetu sampannā tassa bhagavataḥ dhammam sutvā dukkhassantam karitvā an upādisesāya

original: nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyissantīti.
analyzed: nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyissanti iti

original: Ettāvatā ca
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Mahiṇdasena nāmamhi vasanto pariveṇake,
analyzed: mahiṇdasena nāmamhi vasantaḥ pariveṇake

original: Pattacīvarapādo? Yo piṭakattaya pārago;
analyzed: patta cīvara pādaḥ yaḥ piṭaka ttaya pārago

original: Saddhāsilaguṇupeto sabbasattahite rato,
analyzed: saddhā sila guṇa upetaḥ sabba satta hite rataḥ

original: Tena sādhu samajjhiṭṭho yamahaṃ kātumārabhiṃ;
analyzed: tena sādhu samajjhiṭṭhaḥ yam aham kātum ārabhim

original: Sodāni niṭṭhaṃ sampatto thūpavaṃso anākulo,
analyzed: niṭṭham sampattaḥ thūpa vaṃsaḥ an ākulaḥ

original: Paripuṇṇo saṅkhathā sādhu paṇḍitehi pasaṃsito;
analyzed: paripuṇṇaḥ saṅkhathā sādhu paṇḍitehi pasaṃsitaḥ

original: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ kammaṃ karontena imaṃ mayaṃ,
analyzed: yam pattam kusalam kammam karontena imam mayam

original: Tena etena puññena sattā gacchantu nibbutiṃ;
analyzed: tena etena puññena sattāḥ gacchantu nibbutim

original: Anantarāyena yathā ca siddhiṃ
analyzed: anantarāyena yathā ca siddhim

original: Mūpāgato thūpavarassa vaṃso,
analyzed: thūpa varassa vaṃso

original: Tatheva saddhammasitā janānaṃ
analyzed: tathā iva saddhamma sitā janānam

original: Mano rathā sīghamupentu siddhiṃ;
analyzed: manaḥ rathā sīgham upentu siddhim

original: Parisambhidāmaggassa yena līlattha dīpani
analyzed: parisambhidā maggassa yena dīpani

original: Ṭīkā viracitā sādhu saddhammodaya kāminā;
analyzed: ṭīkā viracitā sādhu saddhamma udaya kāminā

original: Tathā pakaraṇe saccasaṅkhepe atthadīpanā,
analyzed: tathā pakaraṇe sacca saṅkhepe attha dīpanā

original: Dhīmatā sukatā yena suṭṭhu sīhaḷa bhāsato
analyzed: dhīmatā su katā yena suṭṭhu

original: Visuddhimagga saṅkhepe yena atthappakāsanā,
analyzed: visuddhi magga saṅkhepe yena attha ppakāsanā

original: Yogī namupakārāya katā sīhaḷabhāsato;
analyzed: yogī

original: Parakkama nariṇdassa sabbabhūpāna ketuno,
analyzed: parakkama nariṇdassa sabba bhūpāna ketunaḥ

original: Dhammāgāre niyutto yo piṭakattaya pārago;
analyzed: dhamma āgāre niyuttaḥ yaḥ piṭaka ttaya pārago

original: Sāsanaṃ suṭṭhitaṃ yassa antevāsika bhikkhusu,
analyzed: sāsanam suṭṭhitam yassa antevāsika bhikkhusu

original: Tena vācissaratthera pādena likhito ayanti;
analyzed: tena pādena likhitaḥ

original: Thūpavaṃso niṭṭhito.
analyzed: thūpa vaṃsaḥ niṭṭhito
